# Kevin Kho - Personal Website

> AI/ML Engineer building data infrastructure and AI systems. Based in Los Angeles.

## About

Kevin Kho is an AI/ML Engineer with 10 years of experience across data, ML, and AI. Currently building knitknot.ai for AI-powered sales enablement. Previously AI Engineer at Drata, Open Source Community Engineer at Prefect, and co-author of Fugue.

## Site Structure

- `/` - About page with bio and background
- `/blog` - Articles organized by category (AI, Drata, Fugue, Prefect)
- `/articles` - All articles in chronological order
- `/intro` - Projects overview (open source and education)
- `/talks/intro` - Conference talks, podcasts, and tutorials
- `/experience` - Professional experience and work history

## Blog Categories

### AI
Articles about AI agents, LLMs, and AI-powered development.

### Drata
Work on AI-powered compliance automation at Drata.

### Fugue
Distributed computing with the Fugue library - unified interface for Spark, Dask, and Ray.

### Prefect
Workflow orchestration and data pipeline development.

## Key Articles

- Migrating to an AI-Friendly Blog Stack (Jan 2026)
- Using AI to Generate 1,000 Compliance Tests (Dec 2025)
- Large Scale Image Processing with Spark (Jan 2023)
- Introducing Fugue (Feb 2022)

## Projects

### Open Source
- **Fugue** - Unified interface for distributed computing across Spark, Dask, and Ray (2,100+ stars)
- **Prefect** - Workflow orchestration contributions

### Education
- O'Reilly courses on distributed computing
